ACCURACYMEASURE.label: Search strategy
ACCURACYMEASURE.description: The search strategy for optimal ARMA model

TRAININGRATIO.label: Training Ratio
TRAININGRATIO.description: The ratio of training data to the whole time series. Assuming the size of time series is N, and the training ratio is r, the first N*r time series is used to train, whereas only the latter N*(1-r) one is used to test

SEASONALITYCRITERION.label: Seasonal criterion
SEASONALITYCRITERION.description: The criterion of the auto-correlation coefficient for accepting seasonality, in the range of (0, 1). The larger it is, the less probable a time series is regarded to be seasonal.
